backup_dir.description: Directory where the backups will be created.

port.description: PostgreSQL port for backup and restore operations.

database.description: Database to manage for backup and restore operations.

retention.description: Number of backups to maintain, old ones will be deleted.

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for the execution of the external commands.

semaphores_dir.description: Directory used to store semaphores for backup/restore synchronization.

max_retry.description: Number of retries for the operations.

host.description: Host server for backup and restore operations.
